name: Running Simulator (PlayerTheMaker)
description:
A game about running I made.

Its not super good.

I made the game with python and pygame in VScode, the music in Lmms, and used Audacity for some sound effects.

Stuff for the trailer:

The music in the trailer is by Toby Fox from the game Undertale

I edited the video with DaVinci Resolve, did the video recording with OBS, and the animation in Rough Animator

The part where I apologize for my shortcomings:

So, I made it somewhat easy to make your own levels, however, on Mac you need the source code to do it, and on windows you can't get rid of barriers. Essentially that feature doesn't work properly without the source code.

Also, if you are using the source code, you need to delete a section at the beginning of the main script if you are not on windows, which should be labeled.

No Linux build yet, sorry :(
